parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the power steering system can cause the vehicle to lose power steering, making it difficult to steer, especially when making turns, which can increase the risk of accidents.
symptoms: Loss of power steering
difficulty steering
especially when making left turns
leakage from under the engine
need to drive slowly when making left turns
loss of power steering when turning to the right.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the steering line can cause the power steering system to fail, leading to a loss of power steering, making it difficult to steer, especially when making turns, which can increase the risk of accidents.
symptoms: Steering line failure
loss of power steering
difficulty steering
especially when making turns.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the flywheel can cause the clutch to malfunction, leading to difficulty shifting gears, and potentially causing accidents or leaving the driver stranded.
symptoms: The clutch pedal feels soft or spongy
the clutch pedal sticks to the floor
the clutch pedal does not return to its normal position
the clutch pedal has a delayed return to its normal position
the clutch pedal has a sudden loss of pressure
the vehicle is unable to shift into gear
unusual vibrations or noises when shifting gears.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the motor mounts can cause excessive engine movement, leading to premature wear on other components, and potentially causing accidents or leaving the driver stranded.
symptoms: Unusual vibrations or noises when accelerating or decelerating
excessive engine movement
difficulty shifting gears
unusual noises or vibrations when idling.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The malfunctioning windshield wiper switch can cause reduced visibility while driving, especially during inclement weather, which can lead to accidents or near-miss incidents.
symptoms: The windshield wiper switch only works when turned by using the washer direction instead of turning on the view switch
the windshield wiper switch is intermittent or erratic
the windshield wiper switch fails to turn on or off
the windshield wiper switch is stuck or difficult to turn.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the front strut plate can cause the strut to separate from the vehicle's frame, leading to a loss of vehicle control, reduced stability, and increased risk of accidents.
symptoms: Clunking or knocking noise from the front suspension
uneven tire wear
vibration while driving
loose or detached strut
difficulty steering
reduced vehicle stability.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: Premature wear on the front tires can lead to reduced traction, increased stopping distances, and a higher risk of tire failure, which can cause accidents or loss of control.
symptoms: Uneven tire wear
excessive wear on the front tires
vibration while driving
pulling to one side while driving
reduced tire tread depth.
